CustomField.formula: IF (Text( Release__c ) = "Burn",3,0) + IF (Text( Reinsurer__c ) = "Burn",3,0) + IF (Text( Child_Case__c ) = "Burn",3,0) + IF (Text( Communication__c ) = "Burn",3,0) + IF (Text( Sold_Plan_Confirmation__c ) = "Burn",2,0) + IF (Text( Notes_to_Specialist__c ) = "Burn",2,0) + IF (Text( All_Holds_Removed__c ) = "Burn",3,0) + IF (Text( Docfinity_Job_Completed__c ) = "Burn",1,0) + IF (Text( QA_Salesforce_Setup__c ) = "Burn",2,0)
CustomField.label: QA Post Review Points From Burn
